chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
e: DT this W A
i: state
r: A -> state -> Prop

Goal:
(i \In Coh W -> verify i e r) -> verify i e r

Premises:
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
Inductive DT (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := with_spec : forall s : spec A, DTbin this W s -> DT this W A Arguments DT _ _ _%type_scope Arguments with_spec [this W] [A]%type_scope [s]
verify : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> DT this W A -> (A -> state -> Prop) -> Prop
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
nid = nat : Set
do_has_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s2 : spec A) (e : DT this W A), conseq e s2 -> do_prog e \In has_spec this W s2
aft_ind_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (p : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i : state), i \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> after i p P -> after i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => m \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) /\ P v m)
aft_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> after i p P -> after (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & P v i'])
rely_ext : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> forall (this : nid) (i : state) (j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s : state), i \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (i \+ j) s -> exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, s = i' \+ j' /\ i' \In Coh V
do' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s2 : spec A) (e : DT this W A), conseq e s2 -> DTbin this W s2
alw_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> always i p P -> always (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this W A) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & (exists q' : proc this V A, q = Inject w q' /\ P i' q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P i' (Ret v'))])
alw_ind_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (p : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (P : state -> proc this (mkWorld pr) A -> Prop) (i : state), i \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> always i p P -> always i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) A) => m \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) /\ ((exists q' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A, q = WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) q' /\ P m q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P m (Ret v'))))
pstep : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
always : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> (state -> proc this W A -> Prop) -> Prop
always_sc : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> seq schedule -> (state -> proc this W A -> Prop) -> Prop
after : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> (A -> state -> Prop) -> Prop
bind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), DT this W A -> (A -> DT this W B) -> DT this W B
conseq : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (this : nid), DT this W A -> spec A -> Prop
alw_unfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always s1 Unfinished P
safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> Prop
alw_coh : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In Coh W
bind_s : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), DT this W A -> (A -> DT this W B) -> spec B
Actions.skip_safe = fun W : world => [eta Coh W] : world -> state -> Prop
EmptyProt = fun i : Label => Protocol i snd_uniq0 rcv_uniq0 : Label -> protocol
alw_imp : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P1 P2 : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc this W A), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always s p P1 -> always s p P2
inject : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type), injects V W K -> DT this V A -> DT this W A
alw_coh' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In Coh W
alw_ret' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always_sc s1 (Ret v) scs P
post = fun A : Type => state -> A -> state -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments post _%type_scope
alw_imp' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P1 P2 : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc this W A), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always_sc s p scs P1 -> always_sc s p scs P2
conseq_refl : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (this : nid) (e : DT this W A), conseq e (spec_of e)
aft_imp : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P1 P2 : A -> state -> Prop), (forall (v : A) (s0 : state), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 v s0 -> P2 v s0) -> after s p P1 -> after s p P2
set_of : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (this : nid), prog W A this -> proc this W A -> Prop
cohUnKR : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s \In Coh U -> hook_complete W -> s' \In Coh W
Actions.a_safe : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid), Actions.action W V this -> state -> Prop
inject_s : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type), injects V W K -> DT this V A -> spec A
aft_bnd : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (p1 : proc this W A) (p12 : proc this W B) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc this W B)) (s1 : state) (P : B -> state -> Prop), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> after s1 p1 (fun (v : A) (s : state) => forall p : proc this W B, p \In pp2 v -> after s p P) -> after s1 p12 P
cohUnKL : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s' \In Coh W -> hook_complete U -> s \In Coh U
do_prog : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), DT this W A -> prog W A this
Actions.tryrecv_act_safe = fun W : world => (InMem (T:=state))^~ (Mem (Coh W)) : world -> state -> Prop
DT_sind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> SProp), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_ind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Prop), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
